introductionHtml:
Inside sales representatives of Vgulp are target oriented, Have an eye for detail, are opportunistic, could sell ice to an eskimo over a call.


We were launched in June 2013, and received funding in August. We are addressing a no brainer idea in a 35 Bn USD market in India, that had little takers for. Vgulp solves a simple problem - helping drinkers (like us, you?) find the best deals and discounts in the most happening joints in town. Through this we improve walk-ins and help merchants meet their business objectives.


Being in the inside sales team for Vgulp, you are expected to identify opportunities, within a wide range - EPL screenings, to parties, to events, to the happening joints, and build relationship with these merchants in an objective to negotiate awesome deals for our subscriber base. upbe a hustler. Unlike our competitors who sell anything from nail polish to spa to auto parts and car wash, we do receive a warm welcome because of our value proposition that we have built along the way, hence we have seen above industry standard conversion rates.


While we are not particular about you having a degree / years into your resume, or you have been in BPOs, we are particular about your knowledge in the online / digital and social advertising space and how they can influence consumer decisions. Specifically if you are in a BPO and wish to apply, you are welcome.

** In the case you have no prior experience, you will start your stint at Vgulp as an Intern / Trainee for a period of 3 months.**

skills.title: What is expected of you
skills.descriptionHtml:
• Be opportunistic, identify and prospect an ideal merchant for high outcomes with regards to their walk-in objectives
  • Explain the conceptual importance to the staff on the floor, while managing objective driven conversation to the business owners
  • Increase revenues, by helping the Sales identify target accounts and passing on opportunities
  • Work with the marketing / customer success team to identify opportunities to upsell / cross sell
  • Maintain a highly sorted database, and execute campaigns / promotions from time to time

weLoveYouIf.title: What you should be
weLoveYouIf.descriptionHtml:
• Proven selling skills - performance oriented in a competitive environment
  • Experience having selling / goal oriented conversations over the phone
  • Ability to take responsibility, and benchmark own performance to improve the metrics from time to time

Benefits

  • Competitive Salary and incentives
  • Work from home
  • Flexible work hours
  • Stock Options
  • Challenging career and growth
  • irresistible leaves and holidays
  • Company sponsored booze on Fridays
  • Unlimited fun
  • Need anything more?
